# manta-button



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                    | Type                                              | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | ------------------------------ | ------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | Whether the button is disabled | `boolean`                                         | `false`     |
| `size`     | `size`     | The button size                | `"large" \| "medium" \| "small"`                  | `'medium'`  |
| `text`     | `text`     | The text on the button         | `string`                                          | `undefined` |
| `type`     | `type`     | The button type                | `"button" \| "reset" \| "submit"`                 | `'button'`  |
| `variant`  | `variant`  | The button variant             | `"danger" \| "ghost" \| "primary" \| "secondary"` | `'primary'` |
